bike.description: C-4 carbon w/ Integrated tapered head tube w/1 1/2" lower, Flatten top tube, Oversized 34.9mm round seat tube, PIIS BB-86 shell, Double water bottle mounts.. Rear triangle: C-4 carbon seat stays, Oversized chain stay and Carbon drop out w/replaceable hanger
